item.title: 7.1 Developing Spring Boot applications
item.description: 7.1 Developing Spring Boot applications Based on the Spring Boot example, check out the process of app development, container image build, and deployment to OKE. Create a Spring Boot-based microservice Spring Initializr is used to develop based on the basic project source file. Create a project file through Spring Initializr. Method 1. Create a basic project source file using Spring Initializr. As shown in the figure below, enter project information and click Generate to generate source files.
